verses.kjv: Hear my voice, O God, in my prayer: preserve my life from fear of the enemy.
verses.ct: Listen to my voice, God, as I bring my complaint to you. Protect my life from the threat of my enemy.

verses.kjv: Hide me from the secret counsel of the wicked; from the insurrection of the workers of iniquity:
verses.ct: Shield me from the secret schemes of the wicked, from the plots of those who do evil.

verses.kjv: Who whet their tongue like a sword, and bend their bows to shoot their arrows, even bitter words:
verses.ct: They sharpen their tongues like swords and aim their harsh words like arrows,

verses.kjv: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect: suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.
verses.ct: shooting from hidden places at the innocent. They strike without warning and feel no guilt.

verses.kjv: They encourage themselves in an evil matter: they commune of laying snares privily; they say, Who shall see them?
verses.ct: They strengthen each other in their evil plans. They discuss how to set hidden traps, saying, 'No one will notice.'

verses.kjv: They search out iniquities; they accomplish a diligent search: both the inward thought of every one of them, and the heart, is deep.
verses.ct: They devise their schemes carefully; they carry out their well-crafted plots. The inner thoughts and motives of each person run deep.

verses.kjv: But God shall shoot at them with an arrow; suddenly shall they be wounded.
verses.ct: But God will shoot his arrow at them; without warning, they will be struck down.

verses.kjv: So they shall make their own tongue to fall upon themselves: all that see them shall flee away.
verses.ct: Their own words will be turned against them. Everyone who sees them will shake their heads and back away.

verses.kjv: And all men shall fear, and shall declare the work of God; for they shall wisely consider of his doing.
verses.ct: Then everyone will stand in awe and proclaim what God has done; they will reflect carefully on his actions.

verses.kjv: The righteous shall be glad in the LORD, and shall trust in him; and all the upright in heart shall glory.
verses.ct: Those who are righteous will find their joy in the LORD and take refuge in him. All who are honest in heart will celebrate.
